reviews.review: O Jogo é ok, se você quer ter o mínimo de diversão, faça um time fechado, cair com aleatório nunca é uma boa opção.

Güzel oyun ama hile var çok

Sana tanrı hakkında bir iki sır vereyim. Tanrı seyretmeyi sever. O bir oyunbazdır. Bir düşünsene, insana içgüdüler verir sana bu olağanüstü yetiyi verir, sonra ne yapar dersin? Sırf kendi eğlencesi için, kendi özel kozmik komedi filmi için tam zıttı kurallar koyar. Gelmiş geçmiş en büyük ahmak. Bak, ama dokunma. Dokun, ama tatma. Tat, ama yutma. Ve sen sekip dururken, o ne yapar? Hasta, kahrolası kıçıyla güler! Hasisin tekidir! sadisttir! görevi başında bulunmayan bir derebeyidir! buna tapmak mı? asla!!

Pure primal instincts guide the winners! This is the best non-stop, full-focus FPS game out there. Don't be discouraged when you first start playing, you will die quickly and frequently. Watch what others do and find someone with experience who is kind enough to guide you. Beware, once you start, you will never want to stop
бан на 7 дней за всё что только можно
CS:GO is a timeless wonder. One of the best FPS games to ever exist
COMPETITIVE IN NATURE , FUN TO PLAY , MULTIPLAYER , HAVE RECOIL IN GUNS , HAVE BATTLE ROYAL MODE , HAVE RANKS !!!!
dont play the free version by prime so you get rid of the most hackers

Best game there is, but there are so many trolls, smurfs, and if you don't pay for prime you will get in a game with a hacker almost every time during competitive. When you get to DMG to LEM you will experience a lot less trolls tho. When you come to the very top ranks then there will be more hackers even in prime.
only recommed for prime players, bc valve dont do shit about their game
very epic legit an essential game
e muito bom o jogo falta da uma melhora porque tem muito hack e a jente perde patemte pra eles

The best game in the world

Ogółem nie polecam tej gry, gdyż zmarnowałem na nią ponad 2000 godzin, a ta gra to kompletna klapa, ponieważ:
- cheaterow jest więcej niż było i nic z tym nie robicie, wasze śmieszne "fale", które są co 6 miesięcy tak naprawdę wcale nie pomagają. Powinniście załatwić np 1000 osób, które siedzą na dupie i obserwują zgłoszenia z danego meczu i np: admin wbija na serwer na spectate i obserwuje danego gracza jak on się zachowuje podczas gry. 
- śmieszne niby wasze zabezpieczenie, które nie banuje nawet osoby, która potrafi mieć 100% headshoot, 40 fragów na mecz i obracać się jak licznik od wody a to wasze śmieszne "zabezpiecznie" nie potrafi zbanować takiego gracza.
dealing with a child that has sharted in their pants and rubbed it all over the house is less frustating than this game
Like.... da fuk u wnat me to say? its fekin' counter strike FFS, ofc its good, nah, its FAQING GREAT. :|
It's only the best fps ever
В игру даже не заходил калловое дермище
